name: finish
description:
Signal that your implementation is complete.

Use this when you are done with code changes and want to end the run.
- status is optional: done | blocked | incomplete
- summary is optional short note

Examples:
- finish({"status": "done", "summary": "Implemented parser and updated edge cases"})
- finish({"status": "blocked", "summary": "Missing required source file"})

Returns: ok: finish recorded
